name: LIQing
personal background:
.content background of researcher's background:
 
* Professor and Head of Department of Computing at the Hong Kong Polytechnic University
* Formerly founded Director of Multimedia software Engineering Research Centre (MERC) at City University of Hong Kong
* Taught at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Australian National University, and other institutions
* Served as consultant to Microsoft Research Asia, Motorola Global Computing and Telecommunications Division, and CSIRO in Australia
* Guest Professor of USTC, Wuhan University, and Zhejiang University 
* Born in the Zhejiang province, China • Prof. Qing Li has been a Steering Committee member of DASFAA, ER, ICWL, UMEDIA, and WISE Society.
• Associate editor (2008-2012), IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE)
• Associate editor (2006-2012), ACM Transactions on Internet Technology (TOIT)
• Associate editor (2005-present), World Wide Web (Springer, Germany)
• Associate editor (2016-present), Data Science & Engineering (Springer)
• Area Editor (2007-2012), International Journal of Distance Education Technology
• Editorial board member (2002-present), Journal of Web Engineering
• Editorial advisory board (since 2000), Journal of Applied Science and Engineering
• Editorial board member (since 2003), WISE Book Series: Web Information Systems Engineering and Internet Technology <Researcher's background includes:
General Co-Chair for several international conferences,
Area Chair for IEEE International Conference on Data Mining (ICDM),
Demo Chair for 18thInternational Conference on Web Engineering (ICWE),
Panel Chair for FFD'17 and other conferences,
